summary: This is an email communication from the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding a technical issue with purchase orders (ANIXTER TP120240 & SIGNET TECH TP120150) for fiber cable and camera systems at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document is marked as sensitive and contains a standard DOJ confidentiality notice.
locations: Metropolitan Correctional CTR, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2019 email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding technical procurement issues at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It references specific purchase orders (ANIXTER TP120240 & SIGNET TECH TP120150) for fiber cable and camera systems that are delayed due to inability to receive the required fiber cable.
The document contains a standard DOJ confidentiality notice, indicating it is sensitive government property.
No individuals involved in the Epstein case are named or referenced in this document text.
